Instance Property# audioRendition

iOS 26.0+iPadOS 26.0+Mac Catalyst 26.0+macOS 26.0+tvOS 26.0+visionOS 26.0+watchOS 26.0+

```
var audioRendition: AVMetricMediaRendition { get }
```

## [Discussion](/documentation/avfoundation/avmetricplayeritemvariantswitchstartevent/audiorendition#discussion)

Contains information corresponding to the currently selected audio rendition.
